column4: I have a problem! I installed ubuntu and now my internet is terribly slow.. it is a known issue! I was very disappointed.. also tried a couple of fixes and it still doesn't work. What is the best alternative for Ubuntu in terms of automatic updates, user friendliness and "it just works"
it is annoying to have slow internet!
what kind of known issue is it? why is your internet slow?
ah.. it's a wireless network connection.. well.. those can be weird
